title: How does technology support us in day-to-day life? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: In investments. In Stocks Mutual funds. PF . FD. Bank transactions. Work from home. Order from home. Open shop on line. Give tuition. Read E paper. Study on line. Book cinema tickets travel tickets, Hotels. Get legal and medical advice. Doctors can get live instruction while doing operation. You can control monitor water tap. Lights. Washing machine from remote. With mobile you can set reminders. Excel is excellent program says time. Accounting you can do at home.
